feedback.title: üí¨ Provide Feedback
feedback.description: Please provide your feedback on the AI assistant's work. You can enter text feedback and upload related images.
feedback.detailedPlaceholder:
Please enter your feedback here...

üí° Tips:
‚Ä¢ Press Ctrl+Enter/Cmd+Enter (numpad supported) for quick submit
‚Ä¢ Press Ctrl+V/Cmd+V to paste clipboard images directly
feedback.imageUploadText:
üìé Click to select images or drag and drop images here
Supports PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF, BMP, WebP formats
feedback.dragdrop: Drag and drop images here or click to upload

shortcuts.submit: Ctrl+Enter to submit (Cmd+Enter on Mac, numpad supported)
shortcuts.paste: Ctrl+V to paste images (Cmd+V on Mac)

summary.title: üìã AI Work Summary
summary.description: Below is the work summary completed by the AI assistant. Please review carefully and provide your feedback.
summary.placeholder: AI work summary will be displayed here...

commands.title: ‚ö° Command Execution
commands.description: Execute commands here to verify results or collect more information. Commands will be executed in the project directory.

command.title: ‚ö° Command Execution
command.description: Execute commands here to verify results or collect more information. Commands will be executed in the project directory.

combined.description: Combined mode: AI summary and feedback input are on the same page for easy comparison.

settings.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Settings
settings.description: Adjust interface settings and preference options.
settings.layoutModeDesc: Select how AI summary and feedback input are displayed
settings.separateModeDesc: AI summary and feedback are in separate tabs
settings.combinedVerticalDesc: AI summary on top, feedback input below, both on the same page
settings.combinedHorizontalDesc: AI summary on left, feedback input on right, expanding summary viewing area
settings.autoCloseDesc: Automatically close page after submitting feedback
settings.resetDesc: Clear all saved settings and restore to default state
settings.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This will clear all saved preferences.
settings.resetSuccess: Settings have been reset to default values

dynamic.aiSummary:
Test Web UI Functionality

üéØ **Test Items:**
- Web UI server startup and operation
- WebSocket real-time communication
- Feedback submission functionality
- Image upload and preview
- Command execution functionality
- Smart Ctrl+V image pasting
- Multi-language interface functionality

üìã **Test Steps:**
1. Test image upload (drag-drop, file selection, clipboard)
2. Press Ctrl+V in text box to test smart pasting
3. Try switching languages (Traditional Chinese/Simplified Chinese/English)
4. Test command execution functionality
5. Submit feedback and images

Please test these features and provide feedback!
dynamic.terminalWelcome:
Welcome to Interactive Feedback Terminal
========================================
Project Directory: {sessionId}
Enter commands and press Enter or click Execute button
Supported commands: ls, dir, pwd, cat, type, etc.

$

about.title: ‚ÑπÔ∏è About
about.description: A powerful MCP server that provides human-in-the-loop interactive feedback functionality for AI-assisted development tools. Supports both Qt GUI and Web UI interfaces, with rich features including image upload, command execution, multi-language support, and more.
about.contactDescription: For technical support, issue reports, or feature suggestions, please contact us through Discord community or GitHub Issues.
about.thanksText:
Thanks to the original author F√°bio Ferreira (@fabiomlferreira) for creating the original interactive-feedback-mcp project.

This enhanced version is developed and maintained by Minidoracat, greatly expanding the project functionality with GUI interface, image support, multi-language capabilities, and many other improvements.

Special thanks to sanshao85's mcp-feedback-collector project for UI design inspiration.

Open source collaboration makes technology better!
